accessories.name: SwiftGlide Pro
accessories.description: A high-precision gaming mouse with customizable DPI settings, ergonomic design, and RGB lighting for an enhanced gaming experience.

accessories.name: ErgoMouse X
accessories.description: An ergonomic wireless mouse designed for long hours of use, featuring a contoured shape and advanced tracking for smooth performance.

accessories.name: KeyMaster 3000
accessories.description: A mechanical keyboard with customizable RGB backlighting, tactile key switches, and programmable macros for gamers and productivity enthusiasts.

accessories.name: QuietType Pro
accessories.description: A slim and quiet membrane keyboard designed for office use, featuring low-profile keys and a minimalist design for comfortable typing.

accessories.name: AudioFlex 7.1
accessories.description: A surround sound gaming headset with noise-canceling microphones, plush ear cushions, and 7.1 audio for immersive sound during gaming sessions.

accessories.name: SoundWave Ultra
accessories.description: A premium wireless headset with crystal-clear sound quality, long battery life, and a comfortable, adjustable headband for all-day listening.
